price: Basi wakamkuta mja katika waja wangu tuliye mpa rehema kutoka kwetu, na tukamfunza mafunzo yaliyo toka kwetu.
arabic: فَوَجَدَا عَبۡدٗا مِّنۡ عِبَادِنَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَعَلَّمۡنَٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّا عِلۡمٗا
footnotes: Mpaka wakafika kwenye lile jabali. Hapo wakamkuta mja miongoni mwa waja wangu walio wema, tuliye mpa hikima, na tukampa ujuzi mwingi kutokana kwetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fawajadā ʿabdan min ʿibādinā ātaynāhu raḥmatan min ʿindinā waʿallamnāhu min ladunnā ʿil'man
